Lab – Create the Virtual Server
------------------------------------------------

In this section you will configure a RADIUS server to enable simulated MFA capabilities.


Task – Configure Virtual Server
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~


#. Navigate to Local Traffic>>Virtual Servers>>Virtual Server List, then **click** the + symbol to create a new virtual Server

|image32|

#. Enter **mtls_vs** for the Name
#. Enter **10.1.10.100** for the DestinationAddress/Mask
#. Enter **443** for the Service Port
#. Select **http** for HTTP Profile(Client)
#. Select **CLIENT_CERTSSO** from the SSL Profile(Slient) List

|image33|


#. Select **SERVER_CERTSSO** from the SSL Profile(Server) List
#. Select **Auto Map** from the Source Address Translation dropdown Box
#. Select **Cert_SSO** from the Access Profile dropdown Box

|image34|

#. Select **mTLS_POOL** for the Default Pool
#. ** Click** Finished

|image35|


.. |image32| image:: /media/image032.png
.. |image33| image:: /media/image033.png
.. |image34| image:: /media/image034.png
.. |image35| image:: /media/image035.png
